elements.title: Eliq
elements.description: Eliq provides software to monitor electricity usage and demand patterns. It takes information from smart metering, connected devices and weather analytics and interprets this to provide instant energy insights and promote efficiency. Awarded phase 2 of UK gov [SENS competition](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/smart-energy-savings-sens-competition)

elements.title: The Top 8 Weather APIs for 2020
elements.description: A survey of weather APIs, useful for PV and wind generation prediction

elements.title: Conwx
elements.description: Conwx high-resolution historical weather data and forecast for power / TSOs / asset management

elements.title: European power forecasting
elements.description: European power forecasting probably a sister company of Digital Engineering mentioned above, Bristol based (same office), focusing on the power forecasting side

elements.title: Watt sight
elements.description: Watt sight Norway based, meteo and trading forecast

elements.title: Meteomatics
elements.description: Meteomatics specializes on the specific needs of the weather sector, energy and trading sectors

elements.title: Nispera
elements.description: Nispera renewable portfolio performance monitoring, asset management, weather forecast for power, bespoke solutions
